activityInfo: Free park zoo, open 24 hours, with enclosures housing more than 450 species of animals & birds.
Restored medieval fort with a visitor center, guided underground tours & a climbable 120-step tower.
Botanical garden with heather, alpine & medicinal displays, known for its rhododendrons & azaleas.
Custard powder factory redesigned to house the world-famous culinary brand's museum, exhibitions & lecture kitchens.
Local history museum housed in a former spinning mill with exhibits focused on industrial heritage.
Iconic, cube-shaped modern & contemporary art museum, designed by Philip Johnson, with a sculpture garden.
Modern mall offering 110 shops, including German & international brands, plus a bustling food court.
Events, festivals & exhibitions in a contemporary vintage car center with seminar rooms & dining.
Popular grassy park offering a jogging path that encircles the lake, plus mini golf & playgrounds and scenic views of the railway bridge/viaduct.

activityInfo: Footall stadium used by local team Arminia Bielefeld. Experience the welcoming and raucous atmosphere of German football!
